rows.label: qev055103_MSG0001
rows.name:
Your strength is almost...feral. To think that you were
able to completely neutralize even a Definian!
Clearly we were correct to side with you humans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0002
rows.name:
I hope you will continue to eradicate all who would do
harm to us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev055103_SEL0011
rows.name: Swear that no target will escape your sights.

rows.label: qev055103_JNK0020
rows.name: Scoff

rows.label: qev055103_SEL0021
rows.name: Chide Sun'celeg for his bloodthirsty request.

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0003
rows.name:
Your tone inspires great confidence. You BLADEs are a
far more skillful pack of assassins than the Definians.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0004
rows.name:
In any case, let us hurry back to New LA.
We have no time to waste.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0005
rows.name:
You find worth in those who would do you harm?
Truly, you humans are inscrutable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0006
rows.name:
Enemies who cannot be used should be disposed of.
The Ganglion can certainly be relied upon to do so
without hesitation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0007
rows.name:
In any case, let us hurry back to New LA.
We have no time to waste.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0008
rows.name:
We must assemble as many of our numbers on this
planet asâ€”[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0009
rows.name: You were...right... I WILL die.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0010
rows.name: But I will not go...being mocked by...insects![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0011
rows.name: I will not...go alone![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0012
rows.name: Aah... My Ovah...fades...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0013
rows.name:
This...is death, then?
But...there is so much...left to do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0014
rows.name: No! We were too late![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0015
rows.name: Do not fret. Sun'celeg. You live still.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0016
rows.name: I do not have long...but yes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0017
rows.name:
Then let us use senirapa water to pass your knowledge
and will on to the next generation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0018
rows.name:
Kun'luarb, this is the last of our senirapa water!
If we use it now...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0019
rows.name:
We may find a new source of senirapa water in time.
But if Sun'celeg's wisdom is lost, it is gone forever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0020
rows.name:
Use the senirapa water!
Grow the life of Sun'celeg![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_JNK0030
rows.name: Ask about Water

rows.label: qev055103_SEL0031
rows.name: Inquire about the senirapa water.

rows.label: qev055103_JNK0040
rows.name: Ask about Growing Life

rows.label: qev055103_SEL0041
rows.name: Inquire as to what they mean by "grow the life."

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0021
rows.name:
The miraculous water stirs the Ovah to activity and
grants continuity to our lives.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0022
rows.name: Bear witness, human. This is the nature of an Orphean![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0023
rows.name:
Bear witness, human, to the continuation of an
unbroken chain of Orphean life![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0024
rows.name:
Sun'celeg, release your life into the light!
Release your Ovah into the light![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0025
rows.name:
It is the birth of Tan'celeg and Ten'celeg,
divided from the life of Sun'celeg.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0026
rows.name: Then my name is...Tan'celeg?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0027
rows.name: And I am Ten'celeg.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0028
rows.name:
Correct, new children of the Ovah.
I am pleased we were in time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0029
rows.name:
So you see, human, we do not engage in inefficient,
animal-like reproductive methods.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0030
rows.name:
We multiply by fission, using the medium of senirapa
water.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_JNK0050
rows.name: Approve

rows.label: qev055103_SEL0051
rows.name: Nod in deep appreciation for this new way of life.

rows.label: qev055103_JNK0060
rows.name: Reject

rows.label: qev055103_SEL0061
rows.name: Scowl and insist that such a thing is unnatural.

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0031
rows.name:
Such is the power of the Ovah.
Is it not a marvelous way of existence?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0032
rows.name:
Many other races have shown an inability to
understand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0033
rows.name:
But it seems you humans are a special lot.
I am sorry that you do not have Ovah of your own.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0034
rows.name:
Yes, many races have shown an inability to understand.
We are well used to it by now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0035
rows.name:
But I must insist that any reproductive method which
requires a mating pair is flawed. Should one half be
lost, the other can do nothing but wither and die.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0036
rows.name:
But Kun'luarb, what are we to do now that we have
used the last of the senirapa water?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0037
rows.name:
Do you think the four of us and our two new kin
are enough to survive on this planet?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0038
rows.name:
We will return to New LA and make our plans there.
With our wisdom and the guidance of the Ovah,
we will find the proper course.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0039
rows.name: I will follow wherever you see fit to lead, Kun'luarb.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0040
rows.name:
Or rather, I have complete trust in the Ovah's urges to
place my trust in your judgment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0041
rows.name:
I will return to the city at once. I thank you, human.
Though Sun'celeg's life was lost, the worst outcome was
avoided.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055103_MSG0042
rows.name:
I hope you will continue to be the strength of a
strengthless people, and to aid in the survival and
prosperity of the Orphe.[ST:wait ]
